Text:
What...the....FUCK...is....this....shit??

Saying that innocent children being murdered is a hoax to cover an agenda to get gun control laws passed in the US is just bullshit....

If this is indeed a hoax where are the children, or is that coming soon in a future Volume of your rant?? There's NO WAY 20+ kids can be kept out of sight this long with no body knowing about it

So I suppose the greiving families of the slain kids are just well paid actors for the cameras...right?

I'm sorry but even the right-wing teabagging freaks that you normally cater to with your downloads will call bullshit on this one..

Looks like you losers latched on to the ONE topic you cant easily manipulate and twist to your sick purposes.

Adam Lanza was a sick dog and deserved to be put down in the name of justice withthe Death Penalty but the coward (like so many of them routinely do) killed himself rather then face the consequences of his actions..

And last but not least, shame on you POtHS11 for even thinking the thought that this torrent was even remotely ok... Hiding behind words like "might" "could have" and trying to make people think that your words are facts... thats wrong. 

And before you say "I have the right to post whatever I want on TPB, its free speech" consider this:

Would I have the right to go to your house POtHS11, and kill your Grandmother, parents, wife or children, film that and put it up for everyone to see on TPB as a snuff film?

And if I further defend that action by saying "I have the right to do so, its free speech" would people call me batshit crazy for doing that?

I will readily conceed that America is raising a generation of mentally ill children who happen to have far too easy access to weapons to feed their delusions but that is a symptom of societal ills in the US, not some "Sinisher Government Conspiracy" to get laws passed...

I hope you find peace in what passes for your life if you truly beleive the garbage you upload.

Do the world a favor please, next time you feel "distressed" about something... keep it to yourself. Nobody sane cares about it anyway.
